main event: A witness reported seeing 2 round objects glowing with a fuzzy red light in Greensburg, PA, on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were about the size of large oranges., They exhibited an erratic flight pattern, moving bit by bit., The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute., The aurora borealis was reported in the area at the same time., It is believed that the aurora accounted for the sighting.
sighted object: two round objects with a fuzzy red glow
witness description: Ronald R. Thornton, male, white, age 25
